step_data.thought:
Looking at the current state of the page, I need to determine if the route is currently showing directions from Central Park to Times Square or the opposite. Based on the accessibility tree, I can see:

- The 'From' field [158] has value '40.7828, -73.9654' (which corresponds to Central Park)
- The 'To' field [163] has value '40.7570, -73.9860' (which corresponds to Times Square)
- The directions table shows a route starting at an unnamed road, then 86th Street Transverse, then 5th Avenue, etc.

This means the current route is already showing directions from Central Park to Times Square, which is what the user requested. The goal has been accomplished.

Let me send a message to the user confirming that the route direction has been successfully reversed.
